(Exact name of registrants as specified in its charter) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Delaware &nbsp; 333-222898 &nbsp; 35-2617337 (State or other jurisdiction of incorporation) &nbsp; (Commission File Number) &nbsp; (IRS Employer Identification No.) &nbsp; 1320 Ridder Park Drive San Jose, California &nbsp; 95131 (Address of principal executive offices) &nbsp; (Zip Code) Registrant&#146;s telephone number, including area code: (408) 433-8000 &nbsp; &nbsp; Check the appropriate box below if the Form 8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#9744; Written communications pursuant to Rule&nbsp;425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#9744; Soliciting material pursuant to Rule&nbsp;14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule&nbsp;14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule&nbsp;13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2). Emerging Growth Company&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;5.03 Amendments to Articles of Incorporation or Bylaws; Change in Fiscal Year. On March&nbsp;23, 2018, Broadcom Limited, a Delaware corporation (the &#147; Company &#148;), filed with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware a certificate of amendment to its Certificate of Incorporation (the &#147; Certificate of Amendment &#148;) to change the legal name of the Company from Broadcom Limited to Broadcom Inc. (the &#147; Name Change &#148;), effective as of March&nbsp;23, 2018. Other than the Name Change, there were no changes to the Company&#146;s certificate of incorporation. A copy of the Certificate of Amendment, as filed with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware, is attached hereto as Exhibit 3.1 and incorporated herein by reference. Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 3.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Certificate of Amendment, as filed with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware, effective as of March&nbsp;23, 2018 SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Broadcom Inc. Date: March&nbsp;23, 2018 &nbsp; &nbsp; By: &nbsp; /s/ Thomas H. Krause, Jr. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Thomas H. Krause, Jr. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Chief Financial Officer
